patthana21.29:4.1: Nahetuṃ nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.29:5.1: Nahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.29:5.2: Nanahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.29:5.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.29:6.1: Nahetuṃ napaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
